metadata.title: CVE-2019-5020 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the object lookupfunctionality of Yara 3.8.1. A specially crafted binary file can cause anegative value to be read to satisfy an assert, resulting in Denial ofService. An attacker can create a malicious binary to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
